title: ObjectiveTurretFocus
description: An objective turret positoning device available for this instrument.

subCategoriesOrder.ManufacturerSpec: This describes the manufacturer specifications for this component (i.e., manufacturer name, model designation and serial number).
subCategoriesOrder.SamplePositioning: This describes a objective lens or stage positioning device available for this instrument. An instrument may have more than one of these devices of different type, such as mechanical stage, piezoelectric stage, objective turret and piezoelectric objective.
subCategoriesOrder.ObjectiveTurretFocus: An objective turret positoning device available for this instrument.

Name.description: A user defined name for this component.

ID.description: A unique identifier for this component.

ZTravelRange.description: The range this device is capable of moving in along the Z axis.

Resolution.description: The expected motion resolution of this device.

PositionLinearityError.description: The expected positioning error associated with this device. Typically expressed as % error.

Repetability.description: The expected precision with which this device is capable of returning to a previously visited position.

SettlingTime.description: The expected time it takes for this device to stabilize at the target position.

MaxVelocity.description: The maximum velocity at which this device is capable of moving.

SerialNumber.description: The serial number of this component

LotNumber.description: The lot number of this component

SpecsFile.description: Provide the location of a PDF file with the specifications for the component as provided by the manufacturer.

Description.title: Description
Description.description: This is a simple multi-line comment or annotation describing this component.

Tier.description: The tier level of this component.
